title: Supervision, Inspection & Compliance
text:
At Trifecta, we specialize in quality assurance and supplier verification to mitigate risks in international trade.



Pre-Shipment Inspection (PEO) ‚Äì We inspect products before shipping to verify quality and compliance with contractual specifications.

Quality Control Inspections ‚Äì We conduct detailed product inspections to identify defects, ensuring industry-standard quality.

Factory Audits ‚Äì We assess supplier reliability, production processes, and compliance with international trade regulations.

title: Welcome to Trifecta
text:
